title: How is technology destroying our intelligence? - Quora

response.answer_text: Intelligence is having the ability to employ both critical and analytical thinking. Not the ability to ‘look up answers’ to questions on some device. Although technology may or may not be actually destroying human intelligence, is is changing the way we gather information. We are learning how to ‘not think’. Why bother when the answers to questions are at our fingertips? What takes some intelligence however is not answering questions so much as how to construct questions.
